segments.text: I'm looking at a scene that feels like a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is up on a two-step stool, reaching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stool itself looks incredibly wobbly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Its legs are splayed out, tilted at an odd angle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It seems like it could tip backward at any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretching so far, putting all his weight forward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is standing nearby, but she's not helping to steady it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm genuinely worried he's going to fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Imagine him tumbling down, perhaps hitting the counter edge.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And with a plate in his hand, that's another hazard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's surprising the stool hasn't given way yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His balance must be incredible, or he's just lucky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone should really stabilize that before he gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The potential for a nasty bump is very high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation just makes me incredibly nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR
